items.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
items.description: Graduated with a focus on software engineering and web development. Developed strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and modern programming paradigms.

items.title: Vocational High School in IT Support
items.description: Specialized in IT support and network administration. Gained practical skills in hardware troubleshooting, network configuration, and system maintenance.
achievements: 1st Place in Student Skills Competition At Province Level
Participant of National Student Skills Competition
Participant of debate competition at province level

items.title: Sarjana Ilmu Komputer
items.description: Lulus dengan fokus pada rekayasa perangkat lunak dan pengembangan web. Mengembangkan fondasi yang kuat dalam algoritma, struktur data, dan paradigma pemrograman modern.

items.title: SMK Jurusan IT Support
items.description: Spesialisasi dalam dukungan TI dan administrasi jaringan. Mendapatkan keterampilan praktis dalam pemecahan masalah perangkat keras, konfigurasi jaringan, dan pemeliharaan sistem.
achievements: Juara 1 Lomba Kompetensi Siswa Tingkat Provinsi
